description.ko: 무한한 우주의 심연 속에서 빛과 어둠의 경계가 거대한 특이점 근처에서 흐릿해지는 먼 성운의 심장부로 떠나는 몰입형 여정입니다.
description.en: An immersive journey into the heart of a distant nebula, where the boundaries of light and darkness blur near a massive singularity amidst the infinite cosmic deep.

prompt: VOID-3, cosmic deep space, swirling nebula of violet and charcoal, a massive black hole pulling light into an event horizon, cinematic lighting, hyper-realistic, 8k, celestial dust, infinite dark void, ethereal atmosphere, volumetric lighting, stars twinkling in the distance.
